user.description:
Enter your AppID and AppSecret from the AlphaESS OpenAPI developer portal.

After setup, you can configure a local IP address for each inverter via its sub-entry options to enable local access when the cloud API is unavailable.

If you have any issues with the OpenAPI, read a list of potential fixes [here]({issues_url}).
